name: reuse-api
description: Tests for Qmate as a test automation framework

scripts.preinstall: npm config set chromedriver_skip_download=true && npm install chromedriver --chromedriver_skip_download=true
scripts.test: npm run test:ui5 && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:nonUi5 && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npm run test:common
scripts.test:ui5: node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio ui5/specs/confirmationDialog/test.confirmationDialog.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio ui5/specs/date/test.date.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio ui5/specs/formatter/test.formatter.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio ui5/specs/session/test.session.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 5 && npx wdio ui5/specs/iconTabBar/test.iconTabBar.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio ui5/specs/userInteraction/test.userInteraction.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio ui5/specs/client/test.client.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio ui5/specs/errorDialog/test.errorDialog.conf.js
scripts.test:ui5:navigation: node ../helper/sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio ui5/specs/navigation/test.navigation.static.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 10 && npx wdio ui5/specs/navigation/test.navigation.s4.conf.js
scripts.test:nonUi5: npx wdio nonUi5/assertion/test.assertion.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio nonUi5/userInteraction/test.userInteraction.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio nonUi5/element/test.element.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15
scripts.test:common: npx wdio common/assertion/test.assertion.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio common/userInteraction/test.userInteraction.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio common/date/test.date.conf.js && node ../helper/sleeper.js 15 && npx wdio common/navigation/test.navigation.conf.js
